title: J3D8: External Walls of a Sole-Occupancy Unit of a Class 2 Building or a Class 4 Part of a Building

contentBlocks.title: General Requirements
items: The Total R-Value of an external wall— in climate zones 1, 2, 3, 5 and 6— (a) where the ratio of the area of opaque external walls to the floor area of the sole-occupancy unit is less than 20%, must be at least R1.15; and (b) where the ratio of the area of opaque external walls to the floor area of the sole-occupancy unit is greater than or equal to 20% but less than 35%, must be at least R2.04; and (c) where the ratio of the area of opaque external walls to the floor area of the sole-occupancy unit is greater than or equal to 35%, must be at least R2.24; and in climate zones 4, 7 and 8, must be at least R2.24.

The Total R-Value of an external wall must be determined in accordance with— (a) for a spandrel panel in a curtain wall system, in accordance with Specification 38; and (b) for all other walls, in accordance with AS/NZS 4859.2.
The solar absorptance of an external wall must— (a) in climate zones 1 to 6, be in accordance with the applicable list below; and (b) in climate zones 7 and 8, be in accordance with Table J3D8b.

contentBlocks.title: Solar Absorptance – Climate Zones 1 and 3
items: If opaque external wall to net floor area ratio < 45%, Permitted solar absorptance ≤ 0.8
If opaque external wall to net floor area ratio ≥ 45%, solar Permitted solar absorptance ≤ 0.35

contentBlocks.title: Solar Absorptance – Climate Zone 2
items: If opaque external wall to net floor area ratio < 35%, Permitted solar absorptance = any
If opaque external wall to net floor area ratio ≥ 35%, Permitted solar absorptance = any, or ≤ 0.35 if shading device overhang is < 300 mm

contentBlocks.title: Solar Absorptance – Climate Zones 4 and 5
items: If opaque external wall to net floor area ratio < 45%, Permitted solar absorptance = any
If opaque external wall to net floor area ratio ≥ 45%, Permitted solar absorptance ≤ 0.35 if shading device overhang is < 1500 mm

contentBlocks.title: Solar Absorptance – Climate Zone 6
items: Opaque external wall to net floor area ratio: solar absorptance = any

contentBlocks.title: Solar absorptance – climate zones 7 and 8 (Table J3D8b)
headers: Opaque external wall to net floor area ratio
